Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: joker
Reviews.Content: This is VERY great phone if you dont mind the small key board. easy to use but takes some time to learn the icons when you goto the menu. sound quality is great just be sure to use a bluetooth or press speaker on the bottom right of the screen to enable the speaker for louder communication. you can hold the watch down by ur waist or walk with it while in a call and still here whom ever you are talking to and here them just fine. highly recommend to anyone who forgets there phone like i do or is just a techy and going for the Dick Tracey look. Hope this helps anyone on their decision on their purchase.

Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: very good indeed , it is very handy every were, every time.I can not compare due to i have not used one before, but for two to three months i have been useing one  product , it has been very good and comfortable , the battery is good at lest , it last for one to two days.The product met my expectation very well, To let you know that the sending time was very good, the package also save and well packed. The product is working very well in which i use it to call every were , any were in the world ,it is also open to every phone line and sim card,you have to use it like a lady b,cos is very good, handy and comfortable.

Reviews.Title: Very nice !
Reviews.Author: Shaggydoo
Reviews.Content: I gave this a 5 rating because it shipped and was received on time. It was securely packaged and everything that was suppose to come with it, did ! Not to mention everything works on it. All apps run well and phone calls are a snap. You will need to purchase your own SIM card . Since I don't really talk that much on the phone I purchased a " pay as you go " type plan which allows me to text unlimited and talk a little if need be. Make sure you read all instructions and fully charge it before use. If you want to feel like Dick Tracey or 007 this gadget allows you to live out that fantasy. I like the camera and media player functions. It also allows you to record conversations with its handy voice recorder. If your fingers are like pickles and are too big to use the touch screen capability there is a small telescopic stylus in the watch band that you can pull out and when you are done with it discreetly slide it back into its handy little hole that it came out of. " Pretty damn neat if you ask me " the price is what hooked me. Under $100.00 and hey, it also tells time.

Reviews.Title: Nice cell phone
Reviews.Author: william alexander luna
Reviews.Content: The watch phone is great, works good with any simcard, have a good vídeo recording quality and pictures, the bluetooth headset works fine, the hands free is ok, the two bateries are a good idea.I think the power adapter is failing, after some minutes chargin the phone gives an error mesage. I have to charge the Phone and the bluetooth headset in a usb port of my laptop. I cant ask a devolution or anything cus im in another country Now.

Reviews.Title: What a watch!!
Reviews.Author: scott
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 8 year olds birthday.  Was great!  good clarity, not that easy to learn to operate the mp3 player, instructions are incomplete.  I am pretty smart and figured everything out, but the mp3 player literally took me a week to learn to do!  Overall, great!

Reviews.Title: Nice watch
Reviews.Author: Neil
Reviews.Content: Bought this watch for a friend who really is enjoying his watch. Call quality is fine  as  far as that goes . Overall he is happy with it

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: S. Burd "AlohaBird"
Reviews.Content: Not a bad purchase for a phone watch that is so inexpensive. My daughter saw it and wanted it. The only problem is, she now wants a SIM card to put in it so she can get apps.

Reviews.Title: Can do better.
Reviews.Author: Edward W. Weibe "ed"
Reviews.Content: Its ok. My issues are the intensely loud startup song it plays and after fooling with the battery and card enough time, the battery snap already wore and broke now the battery wont stay in.  The non-meaning icons are something to deal with. They might mean something in China, but no one can tell what the heck they mean here.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: tlove "rona"
Reviews.Content: the phone came fast but the key biard is so small and it hard to programmed the phone  with sim card . the phone  do work

Reviews.Title: Its good
Reviews.Author: Francisco
Reviews.Content: Its amazing, that a Watch is Cell phone is very cool the camera and the MP3/MP4 player but i dont like that dont have so many applications, i mins have only 2 games, but its a perfect cell phone watch.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: richard
Reviews.Content: Works awsome speaker is not that loud but with a Bluetooth it works great I. Goin to buy a second one for myself the other was a gift

Reviews.Title: product is as described
Reviews.Author: James Martin
Reviews.Content: it is a unlocked quad band watch phone it works great, gives that James Bond feelingpros; camera works good and the design is greatcons; didn't come with the 4gb card or Bluetooth and the touch screen takes some patients for texting but still goodI messaged the seller and they have sent the missing items and they should be here in the next day or so

Reviews.Title: it's ok
Reviews.Author: paul
Reviews.Content: It was ok. It is really hard to text on it so if you text a lot this isn't for you. It's a cool concept but it needs to be developed more. It also isn't the most durable thing in the world.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality device ... very happy with it !
Reviews.Author: Howard
Reviews.Content: Very impressed with the excellent quality of this device.  Sleek and utilitarian.  Packaging was perfect with a neat magnetized hinged box that contained the cell watch that had a little pillow cushion, the charger and the Bluetooth ear piece.

Reviews.Title: Unfair but this is all I can do for now
Reviews.Author: chinna31
Reviews.Content: I want to really enjoy this watch but I don't have an users manuel to set up this watch I want to use so badly.  Could someone help a desperate person out by emailing me an instruction manual???  Pleeeeaaaassseeee!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: watch phone
Reviews.Author: big pete
Reviews.Content: It doesn't operate or function right. I think the upgrade will do better, but for starters it's cool.check out description.

Reviews.Title: I actually like it but it break easily
Reviews.Author: I am Gerard
Reviews.Content: I actually like it but it break easily after less than a month.My friends and coworker liked watching me using this device.I like to listen my music on it.I hate texting, because it is keyboard is too small.Well, I like the calling capability. It is really depends on the environment, if it is loud, it is hard to understand the person on the other line.It is touchscreen so it is neat but when the screen broke, it will not like it ever. you can still use the side button. but you cant text, dial number, etc. so be careful using it.I also like the extra battery but I hope they have the external charger so you can charge it even you are not using the other battery.

Reviews.Title: Review/ and looking a spare battery
Reviews.Author: joseph Buckmire
Reviews.Content: Good day to all. I received this watch cell phone a few days ago, charge the battery,and now the fun begin. PLEASE BE EXTRA CAREFUL when installing the micro chip. It come with very good instruction, with one flaw, on the picture it show to install the micro chip with the contact facing up, toward the white lable that's incorrect, the contact on the micro chip have to be down to the left, opposite the white tag.After installing the chip, it was very very difficult to clip the micro sd in place, every time I try to snap the clip in place it will pop back out. Remember, the space in the watch is very small, what I end up doing I removed the clip for the micro sc card completely, installed the  micro chip, and the sim card from my international AT&T; phone, clip the sim down, put the battery it the cell phone, crank that baby on, and what do you know it came on.It start searching and found AT&T; network, my data and phone number from my old AT&T;,cell phone, all that information is on the sim card, I made a call, took a picture set the time and date,not in this order, so far so good. guys let us be frank with our selves, for the chinese to squeezed together all this high tech electronic in such a infinitestimal watch cell phone, these people are dam good at what they do.All the doohickey we can buy give us the opportunity to play with gadget we cannot purchase here at home for that price,these widget are very cheap. I speak only for myself. One thing for sure it will not break my bank. I love this watch,cell phone and bluetooth, and mp3 player. I give this Item 4 star because the amount of time it took for the installed of the micro sd card, plus I have to leave the clip out that suppose to keep the sd chip secured in the phone, which is no big deal because  one quarter of the sim card is resting on the micro sd chip, and the sim card is secure in place with the clip.In my opinion lots of bang for my buck. Am thinking ahead, where can I buy an extra battery for this item, thanks for all your assistant. Next is the review for the 4-in-1 DV88 Camera Video MP3 bluetooth sunglasses with 8G of memory I purchase from sherryshop. I hope my information will make a serious impack on all who is thinking of buying this item. Thanks for you time.Joseph

Reviews.Title: BROKEN WATCH
Reviews.Author: Noel Aquino
Reviews.Content: ITS BEEN A WHILE SINCE I BOUGHT THIS WATCH... AT THE FIRST WEEK THIS WATCH WAS WORKING WELL BUT AFTER THAT IT DIDN'T OPEN THE SCREEN AND SINCE THEN I WAS NOT ABLE TO USE THE WATCH. I WILL NOT RECOMMEND THIS WATCH. IT IS NOW SITTING ON MY TABLE WITHOUT USE...SUCKS

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: Lasted a whole week..... Nothing more; nothing less.After one week of usage, sim card could no longer be read despite repeated removal and repositioning. Then remained in "emergency mode" until it finally would no longer take a charge.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Veridian
Reviews.Content: I love not having to scramble in my pockets for the phone and the spy-guy fun of it. Camera is cool and phone is great. I am blue tooth challenged however and hearing your called is best with blue tooth or headset plugged in.

Reviews.Title: my phone
Reviews.Author: Charles Johnson
Reviews.Content: its works as well and a phone only draw back is the battery doesn't last long that why two batteries were sent and the Bluetooth doesn't work well other than that it does what I want it to do which is make and receive calls

Reviews.Title: Play around with it and find out what it can really do.
Reviews.Author: Robert Bufkin
Reviews.Content: This watch performed exactly as it was advertised, and came with all of the accessories shown. I turned mine into a Go Phone with AT&T; and it works great. I haven't had many people to call, so I can't say much about the call quality. One thing I noticed is that it seems to only be able to take about 20 pictures before you have to move them over to the micro SD card, but the handwriting recognition makes texting much easier than trying to hit the small keys. I haven't gotten the bluetooth to work yet, so I will probably just get a different brand one, I didn't really like the earpiece design, but the watch-phone works great. So five stars all around!

Reviews.Title: Malfuctions a lot
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Crowe
Reviews.Content: This phone, look great but has a lot of downfalls.  Did not even have it for a week and a piece broke off of it.  Then the bluetooth stopped working.  Then the phone just stopped working at all.  It is not worth the money to buy it.  It is a great concept but it will still take a few years before it is profected.

Reviews.Title: Great Looking Watch
Reviews.Author: Darryl Grier
Reviews.Content: I can't write a review yet because I purchased it for my son for Christmas. I will come back at that time to let you know how it works out.

Reviews.Title: Great and good phone
Reviews.Author: maxwell antwi
Reviews.Content: This phone work great. All my friends love it. But the blue tuth give me  little problm. I need to get diffnt one.ths doesnt work perfect.it comes with 2 battries and everything you see in the picture. The letters are too small but it is essy to manage.

Reviews.Title: an awsome phone
Reviews.Author: Julio Salgueor
Reviews.Content: love the simplisity of the phone and it works great I did have a small issue with the blue tooth and 4gb memory card not being deliverd but I was able to get it resolved and I liked how simple it was to resolve in all I am glad that everything worked out.This is an update to the Watch Phone and it works great, The Camera quality is good not great but good.calls are good and the speaker is week until I press the little button that says H-free that turn on the speaker lauder. The internet browser is a bit hard to work and I don't know how to make it work but I have no need for it. The blue tooth works great. It makes me feel like a spy, like 007.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: Jaime Iglesias "Produccion de Television"
Reviews.Content: Good product, I am very happy,  very compliments entrea time, excellent.I would buy againI would buy againI would buy again

Reviews.Title: amazon.com
Reviews.Author: chino
Reviews.Content: this product is awesome and no damage thanks selleer,SORRY about i message you to return cause the problem is my sim is broken ,sorry AND THANK M,I RECOMMEND THIS ITEM TO ALL ONLINE BUYER

Reviews.Title: Nice toy
Reviews.Author: lsjr51
Reviews.Content: It does it's job , even though the screen is a little difficult to use. It needs to be reminded that it has a blue tooth once in awhile.still have to slide a piece of paper between the battery and sim for it to connect to the network.

Reviews.Title: MW09 CELL WATCH
Reviews.Author: shelly
Reviews.Content: I PURCHASE THIS WATCH FOR MY FRIENDS BIRTHDAY, THE DESCRIPTION SAID THAT IT INCLUDED THE STYLUS, WELL WHEN HE OPENED THE PACKAGE THERE WAS NO STYLUS.  ALSO I WAS TOLD THAT THE PACKAGE WOULD BE DELIVERED ON THE 28TH OF SEPTEMBER HE GOT IT ON THE 30TH.  I WANTED IT DELIVERED ON THE 28TH, BECAUSE HE HAD THE WEEKEND OFF, I THOUGHT THAT IT WOULD GIVE HIM TIME TO GET TO KNOW IT.

Reviews.Title: Lights Out!
Reviews.Author: K Michael
Reviews.Content: Can anyone tell me why the light keeps going out on these things? I have had two and the light went out on both. I cant see how to text call are anything. cant view pictures r see how to take them. The screen stays totally black when the phone is on.

Reviews.Title: It's good
Reviews.Author: Ricardo
Reviews.Content: It's goodBut this time I came I miss full accessories handsfree and a battery as shown in the sale hurts is the third time I purchase and this time did not treat me well.

Reviews.Title: About the watch phone
Reviews.Author: Barboza Aleandro Jackson
Reviews.Content: I received the watch but i thought it was better than that, anyway it's cool. The screen is too small, but it's cool

Reviews.Title: Too funn..
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Got this watch a bit out of a joke, but I managed to get it set up through Net-10.  I tried tracfone, but their sim cards are locked to their phones, so I couldn't hijack that.  So far the quality is good, however, the bluetooth that came with it is pretty awful.  I would recommend not using it and getting something better.  Make sure you don't loose the stylist in the wrist band.  Great if you've got nails, or small fingers.  I haven't been using it for much else, but I'll update as time goes on.

Reviews.Title: problem with product i bought from amazom
Reviews.Author: amazon stylus "bobw17"
Reviews.Content: this articyle wont work i charge it and it does nothing but stay blankw  hen i first got it worked fine now nothingif you can help it would be appreciatedsincerelyrobert t. wayne

Reviews.Title: its too bad and its not worth its prise
Reviews.Author: ALJUHANI ABDULGHANI
Reviews.Content: Too defucult keyboord and its usles itemi dont recomnd it to any bodymy advicleaft and find somthing beteer

Reviews.Title: stupid watch
Reviews.Author: jamal alrajhi
Reviews.Content: this is the most stupid thing I have ever get. it is good just as a watch not anything else and the camera is bad, you cant use the phone speaker, the bluetooth head set dose not work like it should be. I feel stupid cause I bought it. also there is no memory card come with it.

Reviews.Title: it's junk
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: First I received this product the Bluetooth would not charge. It is not equipped properly for mms and standard internet. Three weeks after I received this phone the screen started blacking out which means components were not secured properly .... I would try to get my money back but figure it would a waste of time.....  This contact has very little knowledge on the product he or she is selling. I will say it was nice to have one less thing to put in my pocket.  Two thumbs down

Reviews.Title: DEFECTIVE
Reviews.Author: christy thomas
Reviews.Content: I received the product today Jan, 26, 2012 and it did not work the screen would not respond to touch so i could not even use it. :(

Reviews.Title: No me llego el bluetooh manos libres
Reviews.Author: Eithel
Reviews.Content: No me llego el bluetooh manos libres, ademas las instrucciones solo vienen en ingles, de igual forma el lenguaje de configuracion. No lo recomiendo, aunque el costo es muy bueno.

ProductInfo.Features:
Watch, cell phone, MP3 player, video camera, media player all in one
Quad band (850MHz, 900MHz, 1800MHz, 1900MHz) unlocked watch phone
Accurate and responsive touch screen for smooth navigating
The smallest cell phone in the world
ProductInfo.Name: MW09 Watch Cell Phone ~ unlocked~ Quad-band + Free 4GB card+Free Bluetooth headset
